body: Thanks guys   [Mostapha](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topic/listForContributor?user=2o71qkfqc6voq) , [Alican](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topic/listForContributor?user=0cybcc51oorqw) for your post it helped me to overcome the same issue i've been going through for a whole day :)
